# deleteCharacters(in:)

**Instance Method**

Deletes the characters in the given range along with their associated attributes.

## Declaration

```swift
func deleteCharacters(in range: NSRange)
```

## Parameters

- **range**: A range specifying the characters to delete.

## Discussion

Raises an [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSExceptionName/rangeException] if any part of `range` lies beyond the end of the receiver’s characters.

## Related Documentation

- **replaceCharacters(in:with:)**: Replaces the characters and attributes in a given range with the characters and attributes of the given attributed string.

## Changing Characters

- **replaceCharacters(in:with:)**: Replaces the characters in the given range with the characters of the given string.
